name: Honey Bun Cake
author: Beverly Essner
instructions: Mix together cake mix, sour cream, milk, eggs, oil, and pudding. Beat very well. Spread of batter in a 9 x 13 inch greased pan. Mix brown sugar with cinnamon. Sprinkle over batter. Pour remaining batter over this. Swirl batter with knife. Bake at 350Â° for 40 minutes. Remove from oven. Pour powdered sugar glaze over top while hot.
